go_data.justification: PERIOD is part of the transcription-based feedback loops or post-translational regulation within the clock that functions with a near-24-hour period.
PERIOD is controlled by the TRPA channel PYREXIA to regulate the Drosophila circadian clock.
Expression of clock genes period and timeless in the central nervous system of the Mediterranean flour moth, Ephestia kuehniella, implies PERIOD is expressed in the central nervous system.
